mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER_STATUS_HISTORY ( HISTORY_ID, ORDER_ID, STATUS, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( SEQ_HISTORY_ID.NEXTVAL, #{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT HISTORY_ID AS historyId, ORDER_ID AS orderId, STATUS AS status, UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy, UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt FROM TBL_ORDER_STATUS_HISTORY WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY UPDATED_AT DESC
